mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_만족도조사기본 조회 (DgstfnExmnMapper.getDgstfnExmn) */ SELECT dgstfn_exmn_sn ,menu_sn ,dgstfn_scr ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DGSTFN_EXMN" WHERE 1=1 AND dgstfn_exmn_sn = #{dgstfnExmnSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_만족도조사기본 수정 (DgstfnExmnMapper.updateDgstfnExmn) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DGSTFN_EXMN" SET menu_sn = coalesce(#{menuSn}, menu_sn) ,dgstfn_scr = coalesce(#{dgstfnScr}, dgstfn_scr) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND dgstfn_exmn_sn = #{dgstfnExmnSn}
